segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how quickly it's spreading across the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman doesn't seem to care about the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just ignoring it or really doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should grab a mop and start cleaning up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting dangerously close to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip and fall because of her negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she is, given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her to turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised no one has said anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a slow-motion disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
